channel.title: Interface on The Sovereign Library
channel.description: Recent content in Interface on The Sovereign Library

item.title: TEST: Chat Interface Stress Test
item.description:
Summary: Stress-tested interface and protocol integrity under meta-engagement; confirmed reliability.

Source: Raw Transcripts: Batch 7

What Was Tested

Interface and protocol integrity under meta-engagement (Operator interrogating the system itself).

Result

SUCCESS. System correctly interpreted meta-engagement as a test.

Significance

Validates the Council’s “Director of Intelligence” model. The Operator can interrogate the system without breaking operational mode.
